resources.string: Hello,\nYou need \'Usage data access\' settings to use Mithril play.. Click on the Settings button below, select Mithril Play and turn on \'Allow usage tracking\'.
Mithril Play requires you to agree to the following permissions before you can use it.

An authentication message has been sent to the email address you entered.
Please check your message in your mailbox and click on the Confirm Authentication button to complete your subscription.

If you do not receive the verification email, please resend the verification email.

You have joined the Mithril Play
Enter profile information and get a bonus rewards.

If you do not want to do this now, you can do it later.
Enter your profile information\nGet 1000 MTP rewards.
8-20 characters, 1 or more capital letters, 1 or more special symbols (!,@,#,$), including numbers
Do not have an account? Join now
The information you entered cannot be modified. Please enter carefully.\nAnd rest assured. This information is encrypted and wrote on the block chain, and can only be verified by the user.
You received all of today\'s rewards.
Enjoy the game and visit the Mithril Play app.\nYou can earn a Mithril token, which is a cryptocurrency every day.

When the mithril play official service is launched, gamers can cash out Mithril tokens in an external exchange platform or you can participate in game crowdfunding in the App.\n(More usage will be available further.)

When you delete a game, all of your time and record of the game will disappear. Mithril play keeps the gamer\'s record in a blockchain. The more record updated, the more invitations from game companies with the special gift will be sent to you.
You don\'t have the records to play today. \nPlay any game on your phone! \nYou can get 1 reward from 1 game, so you can get 3 rewards when you play 3 games maximum a day.
You don\'t have any rewards yet. \nYou play any game on your phone \nand can get your first reward today.
Unsaved information may be deleted when logging out.\nDo you want to log out?
Please select all profile information and try again.
Your phone has been rooting.\nThere is a risk of personal information leakage, so Mithril Play will be terminated.
There is no game play record of today.
